00051 Schema *Schema::ms_schema = 0;
00052 std::string Schema::ms_collected_text = "";

00058 Schema::Schema(bool readIds) : m_error_string(), m_next_column_id(0), m_access_group_map(), m_column_family_map(), m_generation(1), m_access_groups(), m_open_access_group(0), m_open_column_family(0), m_read_ids(readIds), m_output_ids(false), m_max_column_family_id(0) {
00059   if (Logger::logger == 0) {
00060     cerr << "Logger::initialize must be called before using Schema class" << endl;
00061     exit(1);
00062   }
00063 }

00065 
00066 Schema::~Schema() {
00067   for (list<AccessGroup *>::const_iterator agiter = m_access_groups.begin(); agiter != m_access_groups.end(); agiter++)
00068     delete *agiter;
00069   for (ColumnFamilyMapT::const_iterator iter = m_column_family_map.begin(); iter != m_column_family_map.end(); iter++)
00070     delete (*iter).second;
00071 }

00073 
00074 Schema *Schema::new_instance(const char *buf, int len, bool readIds) {
00075   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(ms_mutex);
00076   XML_Parser parser = XML_ParserCreate("US-ASCII");
00077 
00078   XML_SetElementHandler(parser, &start_element_handler, &end_element_handler);
00079   XML_SetCharacterDataHandler(parser, &character_data_handler);
00080 
00081   ms_schema = new Schema(readIds);
00082 
00083   if (XML_Parse(parser, buf, len, 1) == 0) {
00084     std::string errStr = (std::string)"Schema Parse Error: " + (const char *)XML_ErrorString(XML_GetErrorCode(parser)) + " line " + (int)XML_GetCurrentLineNumber(parser) + ", offset " + (int)XML_GetCurrentByteIndex(parser);
00085     ms_schema->set_error_string(errStr);
00086   }
00087 
00088   XML_ParserFree(parser);  
00089 
00090   Schema *schema = ms_schema;
00091   ms_schema = 0;
00092   return schema;
00093 }

00095 
00098 void Schema::start_element_handler(void *userData,
00099                          const XML_Char *name,
00100                          const XML_Char **atts) {
00101   int i;
00102 
00103   if (!strcasecmp(name, "Schema")) {
00104     for (i=0; atts[i] != 0; i+=2) {
00105       if (atts[i+1] == 0)
00106         return;
00107       if (ms_schema->m_read_ids && !strcasecmp(atts[i], "generation"))
00108         ms_schema->set_generation(atts[i+1]);
00109       else if (!strcasecmp(atts[i], "compressor"))
00110         ms_schema->set_compressor((std::string)atts[i+1]);
00111       else
00112         ms_schema->set_error_string((string)"Unrecognized 'Schema' attribute : " + atts[i]);
00113     }
00114   }
00115   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "AccessGroup")) {
00116     ms_schema->open_access_group();    
00117     for (i=0; atts[i] != 0; i+=2) {
00118       if (atts[i+1] == 0)
00119         return;
00120       ms_schema->set_access_group_parameter(atts[i], atts[i+1]);
00121     }
00122   }
00123   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "ColumnFamily")) {
00124     ms_schema->open_column_family();
00125     for (i=0; atts[i] != 0; i+=2) {
00126       if (atts[i+1] == 0)
00127         return;
00128       ms_schema->set_column_family_parameter(atts[i], atts[i+1]);
00129     }
00130   }
00131   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "MaxVersions") || !strcasecmp(name, "ttl") || !strcasecmp(name, "Name"))
00132     ms_collected_text = "";
00133   else
00134     ms_schema->set_error_string((string)"Unrecognized element - '" + name + "'");
00135 
00136   return;
00137 }
00138 
00139 
00140 void Schema::end_element_handler(void *userData, const XML_Char *name) {
00141   if (!strcasecmp(name, "AccessGroup"))
00142     ms_schema->close_access_group();
00143   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "ColumnFamily"))
00144     ms_schema->close_column_family();
00145   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "MaxVersions") || !strcasecmp(name, "ttl") || !strcasecmp(name, "Name")) {
00146     boost::trim(ms_collected_text);
00147     ms_schema->set_column_family_parameter(name, ms_collected_text.c_str());
00148   }
00149 }

00152 
00153 void Schema::character_data_handler(void *userData, const XML_Char *s, int len) {
00154   ms_collected_text.assign(s, len);
00155 }

00159 void Schema::open_access_group() {
00160   if (m_open_access_group != 0)
00161     set_error_string((string)"Nested AccessGroup elements not allowed");
00162   else {
00163     m_open_access_group = new AccessGroup();
00164   }
00165 }
00166 
00167 
00168 
00169 void Schema::close_access_group() {
00170   if (m_open_access_group == 0)
00171     set_error_string((string)"Unable to close locality group, not open");
00172   else {
00173     if (m_open_access_group->name == "")
00174       set_error_string((string)"Name attribute required for all AccessGroup elements");
00175     else {
00176       if (m_access_group_map.find(m_open_access_group->name) != m_access_group_map.end())
00177         set_error_string((string)"Multiply defined locality group  '" + m_open_access_group->name + "'");
00178       else {
00179         m_access_group_map[m_open_access_group->name] = m_open_access_group;
00180         m_access_groups.push_back(m_open_access_group);
00181       }
00182     }
00183     m_open_access_group = 0;
00184   }
00185 }

00188 
00189 void Schema::open_column_family() {
00190   if (m_open_access_group == 0)
00191     set_error_string((string)"ColumnFamily defined outside of AccessGroup");
00192   else {
00193     if (m_open_column_family != 0)
00194       set_error_string((string)"Nested ColumnFamily elements not allowed");
00195     else {
00196       m_open_column_family = new ColumnFamily();
00197       m_open_column_family->id = 0;
00198       m_open_column_family->max_versions = 0;
00199       m_open_column_family->ttl = 0;
00200       m_open_column_family->ag = m_open_access_group->name;
00201     }
00202   }
00203 }
00204 
00205 
00206 
00207 void Schema::close_column_family() {
00208   if (m_open_access_group == 0)
00209     set_error_string((string)"ColumnFamily defined outside of AccessGroup");
00210   else if (m_open_column_family == 0)
00211     set_error_string((string)"Unable to close column family, not open");
00212   else {
00213     if (m_open_column_family->name == "")
00214       set_error_string((string)"ColumnFamily must have Name child element");
00215     else if (m_read_ids && m_open_column_family->id == 0) {
00216       set_error_string((string)"No id specifid for ColumnFamily '" + m_open_column_family->name + "'");
00217     }
00218     else {
00219       if (m_column_family_map.find(m_open_column_family->name) != m_column_family_map.end())
00220         set_error_string((string)"Multiply defined column families '" + m_open_column_family->name + "'");
00221       else {
00222         m_column_family_map[m_open_column_family->name] = m_open_column_family;
00223         if (m_read_ids)
00224           m_column_family_id_map[m_open_column_family->id] = m_open_column_family;
00225         m_open_access_group->columns.push_back(m_open_column_family);
00226       }
00227       m_open_column_family = 0;
00228     }
00229   }
00230 }

00233 
00234 void Schema::set_access_group_parameter(const char *param, const char *value) {
00235   if (m_open_access_group == 0)
00236     set_error_string((string)"Unable to set AccessGroup attribute '" + param + "', locality group not open");
00237   else {
00238     if (!strcasecmp(param, "name"))
00239       m_open_access_group->name = value;
00240     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "inMemory")) {
00241       if (!strcasecmp(value, "true") || !strcmp(value, "1"))
00242         m_open_access_group->in_memory = true;
00243       else if (!strcasecmp(value, "false") || !strcmp(value, "0"))
00244         m_open_access_group->in_memory = false;
00245       else
00246         set_error_string((string)"Invalid value (" + value + ") for AccessGroup attribute '" + param + "'");
00247     }
00248     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "blockSize")) {
00249       long long blocksize = strtoll(value, 0, 10);
00250       if (blocksize == 0 || blocksize >= 4294967296LL)
00251         set_error_string((string)"Invalid value (" + value + ") for AccessGroup attribute '" + param + "'");
00252       else
00253         m_open_access_group->blocksize = (uint32_t)blocksize;
00254     }
00255     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "compressor")) {
00256       m_open_access_group->compressor = value;
00257       boost::trim(m_open_access_group->compressor);
00258     }
00259     else
00260       set_error_string((string)"Invalid AccessGroup attribute '" + param + "'");
00261   }
00262 }

00264 
00265 
00266 void Schema::set_column_family_parameter(const char *param, const char *value) {
00267   if (m_open_column_family == 0)
00268     set_error_string((string)"Unable to set ColumnFamily parameter '" + param + "', column family not open");
00269   else {
00270     if (!strcasecmp(param, "Name"))
00271       m_open_column_family->name = value;
00272     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "ttl")) {
00273       long long secs = strtoll(value, 0, 10);
00274       m_open_column_family->ttl = (time_t)secs;
00275     }
00276     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "MaxVersions")) {
00277       m_open_column_family->max_versions = atoi(value);
00278       if (m_open_column_family->max_versions == 0)
00279         set_error_string((string)"Invalid value (" + value + ") for MaxVersions");
00280     }
00281     else if (m_read_ids && !strcasecmp(param, "id")) {
00282       m_open_column_family->id = atoi(value);
00283       if (m_open_column_family->id == 0)
00284         set_error_string((string)"Invalid value (" + value + ") for ColumnFamily id attribute");
00285       if (m_open_column_family->id > m_max_column_family_id)
00286         m_max_column_family_id = m_open_column_family->id;
00287     }
00288     else
00289       set_error_string((string)"Invalid ColumnFamily parameter '" + param + "'");
00290   }
00291 }
00292 
00293 
00294 void Schema::assign_ids() {
00295   m_max_column_family_id = 0;
00296   for (list<AccessGroup *>::iterator agIter = m_access_groups.begin(); agIter != m_access_groups.end(); agIter++) {
00297     for (list<ColumnFamily *>::iterator cfIter = (*agIter)->columns.begin(); cfIter != (*agIter)->columns.end(); cfIter++) {
00298       (*cfIter)->id = ++m_max_column_family_id;
00299     }
00300   }
00301   m_generation = 1;
00302   m_output_ids=true;
00303 }

00305 
00306 void Schema::render(std::string &output) {
00307   char buf[64];
00308 
00309   if (!is_valid()) {
00310     output = m_error_string;
00311     return;
00312   }
00313 
00314   output += "<Schema";
00315   if (m_output_ids)
00316     output += (std::string)" generation=\"" + (uint32_t)m_generation + "\"";
00317   if (m_compressor != "")
00318     output += (std::string)" compressor=\"" + m_compressor + "\"";
00319   output += ">\n";
00320 
00321   for (list<AccessGroup *>::iterator iter = m_access_groups.begin(); iter != m_access_groups.end(); iter++) {
00322     output += (string)"  <AccessGroup name=\"" + (*iter)->name + "\"";
00323     if ((*iter)->in_memory)
00324       output += " inMemory=\"true\"";
00325     if ((*iter)->blocksize > 0)
00326       output += (std::string)" blockSize=\"" + (*iter)->blocksize + "\"";
00327     if ((*iter)->compressor != "")
00328       output += (std::string)" compressor=\"" + (*iter)->compressor + "\"";
00329     output += ">\n";
00330     for (list<ColumnFamily *>::iterator cfiter = (*iter)->columns.begin(); cfiter != (*iter)->columns.end(); cfiter++) {
00331       output += (string)"    <ColumnFamily";
00332       if (m_output_ids) {
00333         output += " id=\"";
00334         sprintf(buf, "%d", (*cfiter)->id);
00335         output += (string)buf + "\"";
00336       }
00337       output += ">\n";
00338       output += (string)"      <Name>" + (*cfiter)->name + "</Name>\n";
00339       if ((*cfiter)->max_versions != 0)
00340         output += (string)"      <MaxVersions>" + (*cfiter)->max_versions + "</MaxVersions>\n";
00341       if ((*cfiter)->ttl != 0)
00342         output += (string)"      <ttl>" + (uint32_t)(*cfiter)->ttl + "</ttl>\n";
00343       output += (string)"    </ColumnFamily>\n";
00344     }
00345     output += (string)"  </AccessGroup>\n";
00346   }
00347 
00348   output += "</Schema>\n";
00349   return;
00350 }

00352 void Schema::render_hql_create_table(std::string table_name, std::string &output) {
00353   bool needs_quotes = false;
00354   const char *ptr;
00355 
00356   output += "\n";
00357   output += "CREATE TABLE ";
00358   if (m_compressor != "")
00359     output += (std::string)"COMPRESSOR=\"" + m_compressor + "\" ";
00360   output += table_name + " (\n";
00361 
00362   for (ColumnFamilyMapT::const_iterator cf_iter = m_column_family_map.begin(); cf_iter != m_column_family_map.end(); cf_iter++) {
00363 
00364     // check to see if column family name needs quotes around it
00365     needs_quotes = false;
00366     ptr = (*cf_iter).first.c_str();
00367     if (!isalpha(*ptr))
00368       needs_quotes = true;
00369     else {
00370       for (; *ptr; ptr++) {
00371         if (!isalnum(*ptr)) {
00372           needs_quotes = true;
00373           break;
00374         }
00375       }
00376     }
00377 
00378     if (needs_quotes)
00379       output += (std::string)"  '" + (*cf_iter).first + "'";
00380     else
00381       output += (std::string)"  " + (*cf_iter).first;
00382     if ((*cf_iter).second->max_versions != 0)
00383       output += (std::string)" MAX_VERSIONS=" + (*cf_iter).second->max_versions;
00384     if ((*cf_iter).second->ttl != 0)
00385       output += (std::string)" TTL=" + (uint32_t)(*cf_iter).second->ttl;
00386     output += (std::string)",\n";
00387   }
00388 
00389   size_t i=1;
00390   for (list<AccessGroup *>::iterator ag_iter = m_access_groups.begin(); ag_iter != m_access_groups.end(); ag_iter++, i++) {
00391     output += (std::string)"  ACCESS GROUP ";
00392 
00393     needs_quotes = false;
00394     ptr = (*ag_iter)->name.c_str();
00395     if (!isalpha(*ptr))
00396       needs_quotes = true;
00397     else {
00398       for (++ptr; *ptr; ptr++) {
00399         if (!isalnum(*ptr)) {
00400           needs_quotes = true;
00401           break;
00402         }
00403       }
00404     }
00405     if (needs_quotes)
00406       output += (std::string)"'" + (*ag_iter)->name + "'";
00407     else
00408       output += (*ag_iter)->name;
00409 
00410     if ((*ag_iter)->in_memory)
00411       output += (std::string)" IN_MEMORY";
00412     if ((*ag_iter)->blocksize != 0)
00413       output += (std::string)" BLOCKSIZE=" + (*ag_iter)->blocksize;
00414     if ((*ag_iter)->compressor != "")
00415       output += (std::string)" COMPRESSOR=\"" + (*ag_iter)->compressor + "\"";
00416     if (!(*ag_iter)->columns.empty()) {
00417       bool display_comma = false;
00418       output += (std::string)" (";
00419       for (list<ColumnFamily *>::iterator cfl_iter = (*ag_iter)->columns.begin(); cfl_iter != (*ag_iter)->columns.end(); cfl_iter++) {
00420 
00421         // check to see if column family name needs quotes around it
00422         needs_quotes = false;
00423         ptr = (*cfl_iter)->name.c_str();
00424         if (!isalpha(*ptr))
00425           needs_quotes = true;
00426         else {
00427           for (++ptr; *ptr; ptr++) {
00428             if (!isalnum(*ptr)) {
00429               needs_quotes = true;
00430               break;
00431             }
00432           }
00433         }
00434 
00435         if (display_comma)
00436           output += (std::string)",";
00437         else
00438           display_comma = true;
00439 
00440         if (needs_quotes)
00441           output += (std::string)" '" + (*cfl_iter)->name + "'";
00442         else
00443           output += (std::string)" " + (*cfl_iter)->name;
00444       }
00445       output += (std::string)" )";
00446     }
00447     if (i == m_access_groups.size())
00448       output += (std::string)"\n";
00449     else
00450       output += (std::string)",\n";
00451   }
00452 
00453   output += ")\n";
00454   output += "\n";
00455   
00456 }

00463 bool Schema::is_valid() {
00464   if (get_error_string() != 0)
00465     return false;
00466   return true;
00467 }

00472 void Schema::set_generation(const char *generation) {
00473   int genNum = atoi(generation);
00474   if (genNum <= 0)
00475     set_error_string((string)"Invalid Table 'generation' value (" + generation + ")");
00476   m_generation = genNum;
00477 }

00479 
00480 void Schema::add_access_group(AccessGroup *ag) {
00481   AccessGroupMapT::const_iterator iter = m_access_group_map.find(ag->name);
00482 
00483   if (iter != m_access_group_map.end()) {
00484     m_error_string = std::string("Access group '") + ag->name + "' multiply defined";
00485     delete ag;
00486     return;
00487   }
00488 
00489   m_access_group_map[ag->name] = ag;
00490   m_access_groups.push_back(ag);
00491 }
00492 
00493 void Schema::add_column_family(ColumnFamily *cf) {
00494   ColumnFamilyMapT::const_iterator cf_iter = m_column_family_map.find(cf->name);
00495 
00496   if (cf_iter != m_column_family_map.end()) {
00497     m_error_string = std::string("Column family '") + cf->name + "' multiply defined";
00498     delete cf;
00499     return;
00500   }
00501 
00502   AccessGroupMapT::const_iterator ag_iter = m_access_group_map.find(cf->ag);
00503 
00504   if (ag_iter == m_access_group_map.end()) {
00505     m_error_string = std::string("Invalid access group '") + cf->ag + "' for column family '" + cf->name + "'";
00506     delete cf;
00507     return;
00508   }
00509 
00510   m_column_family_map[cf->name] = cf;
00511   (*ag_iter).second->columns.push_back(cf);
00512 
00513 }
